text:
The godfather is sick,
right?

You're getting chased
from new york
by the other families.

You think you can come
to my hotel and take over?

I talked to barzini.
I can deal with him
and keep my hotel.

Is that why you slap
my brother in public?

Oh, now,
that was nothing, mike.

Now, moe didn't
mean nothing by that.

Sure, he flies
off the handle,

But moe and me,
we're good friends,
right?

I got a business to run.
I kick asses sometimes.
We had a little argument.

I had to
straighten him out.

You straightened
my brother out?

He was banging
cocktail waitresses
two at a time.

Players couldn't get
a drink at the table.

I leave for new york
tomorrow.
Think about a price.
Son of a bitch!

Do you know who I am?
I'm moe greene.

I made my bones when
you were dating cheerleaders.

Moe,
I got an idea.

Tom. Tom, you're
the consigliori.
Talk to the don--
Just a minute.

The don
is semiretired.

Mike is
in charge now.

If you have
anything to say,
say it to michael.

Mike, you don't
come to las vegas

And talk to a man like
moe greene like that!
Fredo...
You're my older brother,
And I love you,

But don't ever take sides
with anyone

Against the family
again.
Ever.

I have to see
my father
and his people.
Have dinner without me.
Oh, michael.
This weekend we'll go out.

We'll go to the city,
see a show, have dinner.

Your sister wants
to ask you something.
Let her ask.
